entry.def: Two-way means moving or working in two opposite directions or allowing something to move or work in two opposite directions.

example.ex: The bridge is now open to two-way traffic...
example.tran: 这座桥现已双向通车了。

example.ex: Two-way trade between the two countries increased by more than forty per cent last year…
example.tran: 去年，两国间的双向贸易增长了 40% 多。

entry.def: A two-way radio can send and receive signals.

entry.tran: （帮助、学习）双方的，相互的，彼此的
entry.def: If there is two-way help or learning, two people or groups are both helping each other or both learning from each other.

example.tran: 教育是教学相长的过程。

example.ex: Trust is a two way thing.

means.word_mean: 3. operating or permitting operation in either of two opposite directions;

auth_sentence.content: With counselling, communication is always a two-way process.
